text: István Gáli (5 July 1943 – 20 February 2020) was a Hungarian boxer. He boxed as a welterweight. He won a bronze medal at the 1967 European Amateur Boxing Championships in Rome. He also competed at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Gáli was born in Bodroghalom. He died in Budapest on 20 February 2020 at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== *István Gáli at Sports-Reference.com Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:1968 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Hungary
title: István Gáli
